definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately

sentences.english: All the tests were carried on by using HITACHI 7150 biochemicalautoanalyzer.
sentences.chinese: 所有项目均采用日立7150型自动生化分析仪测定。

sentences.english: This is already the second generation of hard disks hitachi those exploiting the technology of perpendicular magnetic recording.
sentences.chinese: 这已是第二代硬盘日立那些利用技术垂直磁记录。

sentences.english: Hitachi doesn't always withhold its design secrets.
sentences.chinese: 日立公司也并不总是隐瞒其设计机密。

sentences.english: The elevators were high-speed Hitachis, using the latest technology.
sentences.chinese: 电梯是高速的日立牌，使用着最先进的技术。

sentences.english: Alstom, Hitachi and others have also secured business.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔斯通和日立等其他公司也参与到这笔交易中。

sentences.english: I started my blog as a practitioner at Hitachi.
sentences.chinese: 作为实践者，我在日立工作时开始写博客。

sentences.english: Shanghai Representative Office, Hitachi Data Syste Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 日立数据存储系统有限公司上海代表处。

sentences.english: VII. HGST was approved to construct supporting kitchen within the lot in SEPZ.
sentences.chinese: 同意日立环球公司在加工区用地范围内配套建设厨房。

sentences.english: Welcome presents you a state-of-the-art offer with a Tamashi home entertainment range .
sentences.chinese: 惠康通过日立家庭娱乐线带给你艺术般的享受。

sentences.english: Hitachi's sprawling business makes everything, from power stations to fridges.
sentences.chinese: 从发电站到冰箱，日立公司的业务已延伸至各个领域。

sentences.english: But Hitachi's own comments on the subject don't inspire much confidence.
sentences.chinese: 但日立自身对这个问题的评价并未能带来多少信心。

sentences.english: Hitachi diesel locomotives has been preserved at Hsi-Hu Sugar Factory.
sentences.chinese: 溪湖糖厂内停用了的日立机车群。

sentences.english: Violence had slowed during the last of the Muslim holydays.
sentences.chinese: 在最后的穆斯林圣日立，暴行有所减弱。

sentences.english: Burned-out cars sit gutted Hitachi Harbour.
sentences.chinese: 在日立港口被烧毁的汽车残骸。

sentences.english: Guo Jing, Shi Xuefen and Li Yan DalianHitachi Machinery and Equipment Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 郭晶，史雪芬，李艳大连日立机械设备有限公司。
